plot: Desperate for money, Homer accepts payment from Mr. Burns in exchange for humiliating himself.

Homer asks Burns for a raise and is told he can have one providing he becomes a 'prank monkey', playing stupid jokes on people and generally humiliating himself. He does,however,get the raise and decides to atone for the pranks by throwing toys which he has bought for the children of Springfield into the crowd from a carnival float. Burns tries to get in on the act by throwing fish guts.—don @ minifie-1
